actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT COUNT(*) as nbhuitres, 
AVG(poids) as poidsmoyen ,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hui_calibreuse_bigdata WHERE calibre = 0) AS calibre0,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hui_calibreuse_bigdata WHERE calibre = 1) AS calibre1,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hui_calibreuse_bigdata WHERE calibre = 2) AS calibre2,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hui_calibreuse_bigdata WHERE calibre = 3) AS calibre3,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hui_calibreuse_bigdata WHERE calibre = 4) AS calibre4,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hui_calibreuse_bigdata WHERE calibre = 5) AS calibre5,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hui_calibreuse_bigdata WHERE calibre = 6) AS calibre6,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hui_calibreuse_bigdata WHERE calibre = 6) AS calibre7
FROM hui_calibreuse_bigdata
WHERE date >= '{{moment(debutDate.selectedDate).format("YYYY-MM-DD")}}'
AND date <= '{{moment(finDate.selectedDate).format("YYYY-MM-DD")}}'
AND calibre IN ({{"" + calibreSwift.selectedValues.join(", ") + ""}})
ORDER BY {{bigdataTable.sortOrder.column || 'id'}} {{bigdataTable.sortOrder.order || "ASC"}}
